headline.title: Book your next Adventure
headline.description: You are at the right place to find and book outdoor adventures!

what.title: We will connect you to the most amazing adventures
what.description: BookingAdventure is a marketplace that brings together all kinds and levels of outdoor adventure activities provided by specialized professionals willing to make it a great experience.

item1.title: Do what you love
item1.description: Through BookingAdventure you will have access to amazing new places to practice what you love.

item2.title: Community
item2.description: Join a community of like-minded people, receive stories, tips and reviews about the adventures and have the power to decide your next adventure.

item3.title: Safety
item3.description: Safety first! BookingAdventure requires that every provider serves all adventurers with safety equipment needed for the activity.

item4.title: Warranty
item4.description: We want to make sure you will have what you bought. Booking and paying on BookingAdventure, you will have your money back in case it doesn't happen.

belief.title: We believe that in the end of our lives what will remain with us will be our memories. Therefore, we seek to have them full of stories to tell of great lived adventures.

item1.title: Explore
item1.description: Navigate through the different types of adventures, use the filters to define what you like and choose your next adventure.

item2.title: Book and pay
item2.description: Choose the date for your adventure, book and pay online right at BookingAdventure.

item3.title: Get ready
item3.description: Each adventure has some requirements for the adventurer. We will inform what you need to take for the activity.

item4.title: Live
item4.description: And the day has arrived. Follow the instructions difined to initiate the adventure and live this amazing experience!

item1.title: Live new experiences
item1.description: Get out of your comfort zone, have new experiences and be a better person.

item2.title: Discover the world
item2.description: Go outdoor, explore and discover amazing new places the nature provides us.

item4.title: Collect lifetime Memories
item4.description: Come back with the most valuable item and a lot of great stories to tell.

form.title: Join our community of adventurers!
form.description: Sign Up and you will be informed about BookingAdventure launch.

mailchimp.success: Great! Now, we need to confirm your email address. To complete the sign up, click on the link in the email we just sent you.

providers.title: Want to join our community of Professional Providers?
providers.description: Are you passionate about what you do and willing to provide amazing experiences to our adventurers?

item1.title: Free
item1.description: No cost to list your services on BookingAdventure. You only pay a fee when you make a sale.

item2.title: More customers
item2.description: Be visible and get known! We will promote your adventurers in many social medias in Brazil and world.

item3.title: Management
item3.description: With BookingAdventure tools you will be able to manage your bookings and payments wherever you are.

item4.title: Support team
item4.description: Whenever you need we are here to help you. Count on us!

form.title: Go ahead! Fill out the form below and we will get back to you.
